articles.title: Letter of Pledge of Participants in Party Congress Adopted
articles.content:
Letter of Pledge of Participants in Party Congress Adopted
 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other members of the party central leadership organ and the participants in the congress.
					 The letter of pledge was read out by Kim Yong Hun, chairman of the party committee of the Pukchang Area Coal-mining Complex.
					
					 It said that all the participants in the Party congress are filled with the steadfast will to certainly achieve the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It stressed that they will hold President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the eternal sun of Juche and Songun and become the first comrades-in-arms and comrades of Kim Jong Un sharing the idea, intention and destiny with him in any storm and stress.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 We will always think of only Kim Jong Un, breathe with him and go straightly to the end, following the Party in rain and snow.
					
					 We will become spark and flame arousing all the service personnel and people to implement the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Party.
					
					 We will link the victorious 70-day with 700-day and 7,000-day true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un to turn the socialist motherland into the most powerful country and paradise of people to be envied by the world as early as possible.
					
					 We will firmly prepare ourselves to be political activists of President Kim Il Sung-  and Kim Jong Il-style and discharge our mission and duty of the vanguard fighters of the Songun revolution in the drive for implementing the behests of the leaders and the Party's idea and protecting the Party's policies.
					
					 All the participants solemnly pledged to glorify the Seventh Congress of the WPK as the glorious one of victors which brought about turning point in developing the Party and building a thriving socialist nation in the history of the WPK forever.

articles.title: Joint Art Performance Given by Moranbong Band, Chongbong Band, State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Joint Art Performance Given by Moranbong Band, Chongbong Band, State Merited Chorus
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- A joint art performance "Following Our Party Forever" by the Moranbong Band, Chongbong Band and State Merited Chorus was given here with splendor on Wednesday.
					 Enjoying the performance were members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and senior officials of the party, state and army, the participants in the Seventh Congress of the WPK, officials of the armed forces organs, those who performed shining labor feats in the 70-day campaign of loyalty and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Among the audience were the congratulatory groups of Koreans in Japan and the General Association of Koreans in China and other overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Invited to see the performance were foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here and their spouses, military attaches here and their spouses, staff members of foreign embassies here and foreign guests.
					
					 The performance started with music of the National Anthem, divided into parts 1 and 2.
					
					 Put on the stage were immortal famous work "Green Pine on Nam Hill" by orchestra and male chorus.
					
					 The performers put on the stage light music and serial songs "Long Live the Great Workers' Party of Korea", mixed quartet "The Voice of the Mother" and male serial choruses "Under the Banner of the Party".
					
					 They sang high praises of the feasts of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and great happiness and honor of the people who are blessed by the illustrious leaders as they are having supreme leader Kim Jong Un in the van of the party and revolution.
					
					 The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience as it showed the eye-opening development of the Juche-based art such as new and peculiar art form with combination of Korean-style light music, orchestra and chorus, unique and refined depiction of singers and their fruity and solemn sound and gorgeous stage decor.

articles.title: Workshop for Participants in Seventh Congress of WPK Takes Place
articles.content:
Workshop for Participants in Seventh Congress of WPK Takes Place
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- A workshop for the participants in the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place here on Wednesday.
					 It dealt with the tasks and ways for thoroughly implementing the important tasks set forth at the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Speakers called upon the participants to arouse all the service personnel and people to carry out the decision of the party congress.
					
					 Seeing a video, the participants deeply grasped the fighting spirit of the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class, scientists and technicians who provided gifts of loyalty to the 7th Congress of the WPK by developing and manufacturing many machines with their own efforts, indigenous technique and sources under the uplifted banner of self-development during the 70-day campaign of loyalty at the militant call of the party.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, on May 10.
					 The message extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un upon his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea at its Seventh Congress.
					
					 It expressed firm belief that the Workers' Party of Korea and the Communist Party of Cuba would further strengthen the fraternal bonds and cooperation between the two countries on the road of building socialism in the future, too.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on May 10.
					 The message extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un upon his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea at its Seventh Congress.
					
					 The message expressed hope that after assuming great yet heavy responsibility Kim Jong Un would register bigger success and the friendly DPRK and its people achieve progress and prosperity under his wise guidance.
					
					 The holding of the Seventh Congress of the WPK at a time when the friendly DPRK is facing all challenges marked an occasion of clearly showing the stand of the WPK to build a thriving socialist nation, effect great innovations in building an economic giant and wage an uninterrupted struggle to  achieve the final victory on the firm basis of the basic idea of the WPK taking it as the basic purpose to realize the independence of the working masses and the Songun political line on bolstering up the defence capabilities of the country, the message noted.
					
					 The Congress for Founding the Central Organizing Committee of the Communist Party of North Korea held in October, 1945 was a historic event which brought about a basic turn in building a new society in Korea and hewing out the destiny of the Korean people and the recent Seventh Congress of the WPK is the continued course of the struggle of the WPK to round off the anti-imperialist democratic revolution and continue to push forward the revolution and construction according to the line of the three revolutions--ideological, technological and cultural, it said, and went on: On this occasion, I recollect the great feats of HE Kim Jong Il, the state leader and great patriot, who led the people of your country to victory in the worst circumstances, pursuant to the transparent idea and line of resistance while firmly adhering to the basic line of the Korean revolution based on the Juche idea after fully personifying the idea and trait of HE Kim Il Sung, the founder and eternal Pres
					
					 ident of the DPRK.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I extend once again warm congratulations to you who are deeply trusted by the WPK.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of C.C., CPV
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of C.C., CPV
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a congratulatory message from Nguyen Phu Trong, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam (CPV), on Tuesday.
					 The general secretary in the message extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the WPK on behalf of the Central Committee of the CPV and on his own behalf.
					
					 The message sincerely hoped that the WPK and the Korean people would register big successes in the cause of building prosperous DPRK for their happy life under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It also hoped that the traditional Vietnam-DPRK friendship would develop day by day.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and great successes in his heavy yet responsible work.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Lawmaker
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Lawmaker
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councillors of Japan, on Wednesday, congratulating him upon his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Tuesday received a congratulatory letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The letter said that Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) at its Seventh Congress was an expression of the absolute trust and unanimous loyalty of all people to him and marked a great revolutionary event of special mention as it promises a new history of great prosperity for the country and the nation.
					
					 At this moment when the nation has had the great fortune of holding up Kim Jong Un as Chairman of the WPK, the Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan are overwhelmed with surging excitement as his immense favor is coming to their minds repeatedly, the letter noted.
					
					 It said that the patriotic cause of Chongryon is sure to triumph along with the Korean revolution as it has him in high esteem as chairman of the WPK.
					
					 It pointed out that the Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan will make a tangible contribution to the building of a powerful socialist nation in the homeland and the cause of the country's reunification and conduct more energetic work with the Japanese people true to the important guidelines which he indicated at the Seventh Congress of the WPK though the situation gets more complicated and the Japanese authorities become ever more undisguised in suppression.
					
					 The letter wished Kim Jong Un good health for the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution, the happiness of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and the accomplishment of the cause of human independence.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan headed by Pak Yong Gi, vice department director of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, Wednesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 The members of the group laid bunches of flowers before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Issue of Succession to Leadership Settled in DPRK
articles.content:
Issue of Succession to Leadership Settled in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- The respected Comrade Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea at its 7th Congress. It is an expression of the Korean party, army and people's unshakable faith and will to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche through generations.
					 The WPK has successfully settled the issue of continuity to the leader's idea and cause to carry forward the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea in his early years and had led the untrodden and arduous Korean revolution to victory for many years, thus displaying the dignity and honor of the nation. And he built a socialist state, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence, in the country to lay a solid foundation for the victorious cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 The 8th Plenary Meeting of the 5th Central Committee of the WPK in February Juche 63 (1974) put forward the great Comrade Kim Jong Il as the heir to the President. Then, Kim Jong Il had further developed the WPK into a Juche-type revolutionary Party and guided the cause of Juche along the road of victory by faithfully inheriting the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of the President as Kimilsungism and conducted his energetic ideo-theoretical activities to exalt the brilliance of Kimilsungism as the great idea in the era of independence. And he realized the cause of perpetuating the memory of the President for the first time in history.
					
					 The Third Conference of the WPK in September 2010 elected the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un to a leading position of the Party, again smoothly settling the issue of continuity to the cause of the Juche revolution, the issue of building a party into that of its leader.
					
					 The WPK formulated the revolutionary idea of the great leaders as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and declared the modeling of the whole society on it as the supreme programme of the party.
					
					 It took measures to further spruce up the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, as the sacred temple of Juche and erect their statues as well as mosaics picturing their smiling images across the country.
					
					 It led all sectors and units of the country to implement the great leaders' behests to the letter, regarding them as the lifeline, so that their glorious history of revolutionary activities can continue along with the prosperous development of the country.
					
					 The WPK will always emerge victorious as it has been blessed by the great leaders, reliably inheriting their idea and leadership.

articles.title: DPRK Turns into Youth Power under Kim Jong Un's Guidance
articles.content:
DPRK Turns into Youth Power under Kim Jong Un's Guidance
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Under the deep trust and loving care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the young people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are displaying the dignity of the DPRK as a youth power, sharing the idea and will with him.
					 Some months ago, they finished the construction of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 in less than half a year in the wake of building power station Nos. 1 and 2 as a monumental edifice representing the youth.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has pursued the policy of giving importance to youth, with his insight into the distant future of the Korean revolution.
					
					 In August Juche 101 (2012) when a touch-and-go situation was prevailing in the Korean Peninsula, he saw to it that the Youth Day was splendidly celebrated as a great auspicious event to be specially recorded in the history of the nation. And he, on his way to inspection of the front, extended a congratulatory message to the participants in the Youth Day celebrations and all other young people of the country.
					
					 In April 2015 he visited the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station under construction, appreciating that its young builders had done a lot of work in the frigid area of Mt. Paektu. Then he called on them to complete the project before the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and thus show the whole world that 70 years of the WPK is a history of attaching importance to the youth in which a youth power has been built.
					
					 Later, he named the power station and attended its inaugural ceremony to praise its young builders' feats, have a photo session with them and watch a grand young soldier-civilian chorus performed by them.
					
					 He made sure that the 2nd National Meeting of Young Frontrunners in Noble Traits was held in Pyongyang and had a photo session with its participants. And he sent a message of thanks to the party and youth league organizations which have trained the young people to be forerunners of the era.
					
					 Today the youth Koreans are filled with a strong will to remain true to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, and thus demonstrate the prestige and might of the youth power.

articles.title: U.S. Had Better Not to Miss Opportunity: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Had Better Not to Miss Opportunity: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- There are a series of assertions that the Obama administration should boldly make a policy switchover now that the balance of force between the U.S. and the DPRK has changed.
					 The U.S. magazine Foreign Policy on April 27 carried an article on the Obama administration's failed policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 Recalling that in 1994 the Clinton regime made such agreement with north Korea as the DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework, the article blamed the Obama regime for having blocked the channel of negotiations with north Korea only to push Pyongyang to further developing its nuclear weapons and missile program.
					
					 If the Obama administration sticks to the principle of not taking the lesson drawn from the 1990s into consideration at all nor engaging north Korea, it will miss the opportunity for good, it held.
					
					 As seen above, it is the requirement of the present developing situation that the U.S. should make an immediate switchover in its policy toward the DPRK as it compelled the DPRK to have access to a strong nuclear deterrent. 
					
					 The U.S. is chiefly to blame for the escalating tensions on the Korean peninsula, the hottest spot in the world.
					
					 For more than half a century the U.S. has staged ceaseless mad-cap nuclear war drills for a nuclear attack on the DPRK after deploying a lot of nuclear weapons. 
					
					 It has resorted to undisguised nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK after turning south Korea into the world's biggest nuclear arsenal and outpost for a nuclear war.
					
					 Washington openly put the DPRK on the list of targets of preemptive nuclear attack, made it its policy never to co-exist with the DPRK and has gone so reckless as to threaten to use nuclear force against it.
					
					 The present Obama regime set it as the pivot of its policy toward the DPRK to deny dialogue and wait with "patience" until the DPRK shows a sign of change in its actions like dismantlement of its nukes and has persistently pursued it since its emergence while imposing pressure and "sanctions" upon it.
					
					 Pursuant to it, joint military drills involving all types of lethal war hardware and huge aggressor troops have been staged every year in south Korea and its vicinity to seriously threaten the security of the DPRK, thus escalating the military threat seeking the "collapse of its social system."
					
					 The DPRK was entirely just and legitimate when it had access to nukes to protect its sovereignty and dignity of the nation from the ceaseless nuclear threat and blackmail and aggression by the U.S.
					
					 As the world's biggest nuclear weapons state U.S. has antagonized the DPRK and escalated nuclear threat, the DPRK was compelled to have access to nukes, and the Obama administration's DPRK policy pushed it to having access to H-bomb. 
					
					 It is the undeniable stark reality that the DPRK, one of the advanced nuclear powers, is standing in confrontation with the U.S. by dint of its strong military muscle.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in its policy hostile to the DPRK, paying no heed to anyone's advice, the nuclear deterrent of the DPRK will be steadily bolstered up both in quality and quantity to defend the sovereignty of the country, vital rights of the nation and peace on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of the region.
					
					 Opportunity will not be given to the U.S. at all times.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Plan to Stage Combined Submarine Drill in Collusion with Outside Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Plan to Stage Combined Submarine Drill in Collusion with Outside Forces
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers are mulling staging a combined submarine drill in the South Sea of Korea from May 25 to June 3 in collusion with outside forces including the U.S. and Japan, according to the south Korean Yonhap News. 
					 The puppet navy announced that the military drill would be staged in waters off Jinhae and Jeju Island with submarines involved and at the end of the drill, all participating armed forces would be brought to the Jeju naval base.
					
					 This fully discloses for what purpose the Jeju naval base which has been built by the puppet warmongers so far is.
					
					 They are making a desperate bid to introduce even the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" watching for a chance to stage a comeback to the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Meet
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Meet
 Tokyo, May 10 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) met at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Tuesday to listen to the news that Marshal Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice chairpersons of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, leading officials of Chongryon and officials of its organizations and enterprises.
					
					 Upon hearing the news that Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the WPK thanks to the unanimous will and desire of all party members, service personnel and people, the participants broke into loud applause and cheers of "hurrah!" looking up to his portrait.
					
					 The participants listened to the closing address made by Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 In the meantime, Chongryon is arranging the study of the report on review of the work of the Central Committee of the WPK made by him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Dominica
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Dominica
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in booklet by the Kelvis Publishing House of Dominica on April 30 on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the  history of the WPK is a proud course in which it has taken care of the people's destiny in a responsible manner and led the Korean revolution to victory under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Indonesian Newspapers Observe Seventh Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Indonesian Newspapers Observe Seventh Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Indonesian newspapers on May 4 dedicated full pages to special write-ups to observe the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, illustrated with photos of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 International Media said in an article that the WPK founded on October 10, 1945 unswervingly led the DPRK and its people only along the path of socialism despite all challenges and trials of history.
					
					 It is the unshakable faith and will of the WPK to accomplish the cause of popular masses' independence and the cause of socialism.
					
					 This is well illustrated by the 70 odd year-long history of the WPK.
					
					Socialist Korea will always emerge victorious as it is led by the WPK.
					
					 International Daily in an article noted that the Seventh Congress of the WPK would comprehensively analyze and review the successes made in the revolution and construction under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and unroll a brilliant blueprint for hastening the final victory of the Korean revolution.

articles.title: 7th Congress of WPK Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
7th Congress of WPK Celebrated Abroad
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- There took place events in different countries in celebration of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 An opening ceremony of the Kimjongilia show took place in China, meeting in Malaysia, book, photo and handicrafts exhibition in Indonesia, seminar in Brazil and film show in Nigeria between May 3 and 5.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il by founding and developing the WPK and exploits Chairman of the WPK Kim Jong Un performed by energetically steering the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, books and photos introducing the victorious and glorious course of the WPK, immortal Kimjongilias and handicrafts associated with talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Shown at the film show was the Korean film "The Sun of Songun Shedding Its Rays All over the World".
					
					 The chairman of the Malaysia-DPRK Friendship Association said the world knows no such party as the WPK which has won victories enjoying absolute support and trust from the popular masses for such a long period.
					
					 The secretary general of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea said the 7th Congress of the WPK would mark a significant occasion in actively promoting the struggle of the Korean people and other progressives advancing along the road of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Kuwaiti and Brazilian Media Mark KPA Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Kuwaiti and Brazilian Media Mark KPA Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Kuwaiti and Brazilian media marked the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The Kuwait Times on May 1 carried an article titled "Invincible KPA" illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The article said the revolutionary armed forces of Korea which was born in the flames of the anti-Japanese war have recorded only the history of sure victory in the fierce standoff with the formidable imperialist enemies for the past 80 odd years.
					
					 The KPA could demonstrate sure victory firstly because it held in high esteem the peerlessly great men as its supreme commanders and secondly thanks to its politico-ideological might.
					
					 Thirdly it could do so thanks to its tremendous military and technical capability.
					
					 Fourthly it could do so thanks to the steel-strong great army-people unity.
					
					 The KPA will always display the might of sure victory.
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its homepage an article titled "Korean service personnel creating wealth for people" on April 28. It introduced in detail the heroic feats the service personnel of the KPA have performed by building a lot of grand monumental structures for the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people in the annals of the revolution.

articles.title: Foreign Personages Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Foreign Personages Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Russian, Iranian and Nigerian personages from all walks of life paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries between May 4 and 6 on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They were the chief of the Khabarovsk Territorial branch body of "A Just Russia," the secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the director of the Asia-Pacific Region International Relations Study Center in Khabarovsk, members of the groups of the Russian Khabarovsk Territorial Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and Experience in Socialist Construction of the DPRK, the director of the international relations department of the Iranian Workers' House and his party and a Nigerian lawmaker and his party.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the art piece depicting them standing together and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Efectuado acto de aprobacion de juramento de participantes en VII Congreso de PTC
articles.content:
Efectuado acto de aprobacion de juramento de participantes en VII Congreso de PTC
Pyongyang, 11 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril un acto para aprobar la carta de juramento de los participantes en el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, dedicado al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					Asistieron a la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros miembros de los organos directivos centrales del Partido y los participantes en el Congreso.
					
					Kim Yong Hun, presidente del Comite del PTC en el Complejo Carbonifero de la Region de Pukchang, dio lectura a la carta de juramento dedicado al Mariscal.
					
					Todos los participantes en el Congreso tienen la firme determinacion de lograr sin falta la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria de Juche sosteniendo con fidelidad a la direccion del Mariscal, senala la carta y continua:
					
					Sostendremos al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il como eternos soles del Juche y el Songun y seremos primer companero de arma y primer camarada del PTC que comparte la idea, el proposito y el destino con el Mariscal en cualesquiera tempestades.
					
					Pensaremos siempre en el Mariscal, respiraran junto con el y seguiran siempre por el unico camino indicado por el partido.
					
					Seremos encendedores para movilizar a todos los militares y todos los civiles a la materializacion de la resolucion del Congreso.
					
					Haremos de la campana de 70 dias de la victoria la campana de 700 y 7 000 dias en pleno acato al noble proposito del Mariscal de convertir lo mas pronto posible la patria socialista en la potencia mejor y paraiso del pueblo.
					
					Seremos los verdaderos servidores al pueblo quienes somos infinitamente modestos ante pueblo y hacemos mas los trabajos utiles a los habitantes guardando en lo profundo de corazon el noble proposito del Mariscal que siempre nos desea compartir el aliento y paso con el en el camino para el pueblo.
					
					Nos prepararemos bien como activistas politicos que trabajamos al estilo del Presidente y el Dirigente para asi cumplir satisfactoriamente la mision y el deber de vanguardistas de la revolucion del Songun en los trabajos por la materializacion de los legados de los lideres, la ejecucion de la idea del partido y la defensa de la politica del partido.
					
					Todos los participantes juraron solemnemente la observacion estricta del juramento de hoy y asi registrar en la historia del PTC el VII Congreso como conclave de los triunfadores y de gloria que trajo un cambio trascendental en el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo y en la causa de la construccion de la potencia socialista.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion conjunta por VII Congreso de PTC
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion conjunta por VII Congreso de PTC
Pyongyang, 11 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 en esta capital la funcion conjunta de la Banda Moranbong, la Chongbong y el Coro Estatal Benemerito por el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea "Seguiremos para siempre al Partido".
					La vieron los miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, los cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los participantes en el septimo Congreso del PTC, los funcionarios de los organos de las fuerzas armadas, los ameritados que acumularon las brillantes proezas laborales en la campana de 70 dias de fidelidad y trabajadores de distintos estratos en esta capital, asi como los coreanos en ultramar inclusive el grupo de coreanos residentes en Japon y el de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China, que estan de visita en la patria para felicitar el VII Congreso del PTC y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Fueron invitados los esposos de los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales, los de los agregados militares y los miembros de las embajadas, acreditados en la RPDC y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					La funcion iniciada con el Himno Patriotico tuvo lugar dividiendo en dos partes.
					
					Se pusieron en la escena la musica orquestal y coro masculino "Pino verde en el monte Nam", obra maestra, la musica ligera y cancion en serie "Viva el gran Partido del Trabajo de Corea", el cuarteto mixto "Voz de madre", el coro masculino en serie "Siguiendo a la bandera del partido" y otras piezas.
					
					Oyeron las canciones de elogio a las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Se escenificaron el coro mixto y coro masculino "No envidiamos nada a nadie en el mundo", obra laureada con el Premio Kim Il Sung y el Premio Kim Jong Il, el coro sin acompanamiento "Amamos", los coros femeninos "Gloria al Partido del Trabajo de Corea" y "Deseo del pueblo".
					
					Recibio elogios calurosos de los espectadores la funcion que demostro la forma artistica nueva y tipica que combino al estilo coreano la musica ligera, la orquestal y el coro, la descripcion vivida de los cantantes y el eco abundante, la decoracion escenica y otros aspectos de desarrollo de arte del Juche.

articles.title: Impartido cursillo para participantes en VII Congreso del PTC
articles.content:
Impartido cursillo para participantes en VII Congreso del PTC
Pyongyang, 11 de mayo (ACNC) -- Se impartio el dia 11 en esta capital el cursillo para los participantes en el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					En la ocasion se debatieron las tareas y remedios para materializar estrictamente las tareas programaticas presentadas en el Congreso.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae y Choe Thae Bok hicieron uso de la palabra con el titulo de "Para desempenar la responsabilidad y papel en la materializacion de la resolucion del Congreso del Partido cumpliendo el juramento tomado en el Congreso de gloria".
					
					Los oradores dijeron que el VII Congreso del PTC efectuado en presencia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un fue un gran festival politico mas solemne a ser registrado en letras doradas en la historia del gran Partido Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista, y un conclave mas digno de triunfadores y de gloria. 
					
					Enfatizaron que el informe historico presentado por el Mariscal en el Congreso sirve de una bandera inmortal, que ilumina el radiante camino del desarrollo del partido y la revolucion, y de gran programa que abrio el camino de eterna duracion de la revolucion jucheana.
					
					Refirieron que todos los participantes deben comenzar la materializacion de la resolucion del Congreso con el estudio sobre el informe.
					
					E insistieron en la necesidad de movilizar a todos los militares y civiles a la materializacion de la resolucion del Congreso y registrar un cambio radial en el punto de vista ideologico y la manera de trabajo de los funcionarios. 
					
					En el cursillo se ofrecio una leccion con multimedia bajo el titulo de "Orgullosos frutos alcanzados por el espiritu de nuestro Partido de conceder primacia al autofortalecimiento".
					
					Los participantes asimilaron el espiritu de la lucha de la heroica clase obrera Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il y los cientificos y tecnicos quienes en el periodo de la campana de 70 dias prepararon regalos de fidelidad dedicados al VII Congreso del PTC al desarrollar y fabricar muchas maquinas con las fuerzas, tecnologias y recursos nacionales y manteniendo el principio de autofortalecimiento, respondiendo al llamamiento combativo del partido.
					
					Sintieron de nuevo que cuando mantienen con firmeza el principio de dar primacia al autofortalecimiento, segun la voluntad del CC del PTC, pueden frustrar la brutal campana de sancion y aplastamiento de las fuerzas hostiles y crear sucesivamente los milagros y meritos asombrosos en el movimiento de creacion de la velocidad de Mallima por la materializacion de la resolucion del Congreso del Partido.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 11 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 10 Raul Castro Ruz, Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba.
					El texto va como sigue:
					
					Estimado companero:
					
					Me complace expresarle mis felicitaciones por su eleccion como Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en su VII Congreso. 
					
					Estoy convencido de que el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Partido Comunista de Cuba consolidaran los lazos de hermandad y colaboracion en la construccion del socialismo en nuestros respectivos paises.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Presidente Sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Presidente Sirio 
Pyongyang, 11 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 10 el Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					La misiva senala:
					
					Le hago llegar a Vd. mis sinceras felicitaciones por su eleccion como Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en el VII Congreso del PTC. 
					
					Deseo a Vd. con importante cargo mayores exitos y a su pais y pueblo amistosos el progreso y prosperidad bajo la sabia orientacion de Vd. 
					
					El VII Congreso del PTC, celebrado en los momentos en que vuestro pais fraternal se enfrenta con los desafios de toda indole, sirve de un motivo que muestra claramente el ideal principal de vuestro partido cuya meta fundamental es lograr la independencia de las masas populares trabajadoras, y la posicion de vuestro partido de seguir la lucha por la victoria final al construir un Estado prospero socialista y crear grandes innovaciones en la construccion de la potencia economica basandose firmemente en la linea de la politica de Songun de consolidar la capacidad de defensa nacional del pais. 
					
					La conferencia de fundacion del Comite Central Organizativo del Partido Comunista de Corea del Norte, efectuada en octubre de 1945, fue un acontecimiento historico que trajo el cambio radical en la construccion de nueva sociedad en Corea y en la forja del destino del pueblo coreano. Y el reciente VII Congreso del PTC es el proceso continuo de la lucha de vuestro partido por cumplir la revolucion democratica antiimperialista y promover ininterrumpidamente la revolucion y la construccion segun la linea de las tres revoluciones de la ideologia, la tecnologia y la cultura.
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, recuerdo las nobles proezas de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, Dirigente de Estado y gran Patriota quien encarnando invariablemente el ideal y los rasgos de Su Excelencia Kim Il Sung, fundador y eterno Presidente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, mantuvo con firmeza los lineamientos fundamentales de la revolucion coreana basados en la idea Juche y condujo con la firme idea y linea de resistencia al pueblo a la victoria, pese a la peor situacion.
					
					En esta oportunidad vuelvo a extenderle las calurosas felicitaciones a Vd. que gana gran confianza del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de Kanji Inoki
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de Kanji Inoki
Pyongyang, 11 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que le enviara el dia 11 el miembro de la Camara de Consejeros de Japon, Kanji Inoki, felicitandola eleccion como Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
